Text:
It worked and microsoft's site said my windows is legal, but while i was in the middle of installing SP2 it gave a message that my windows isn't legal and stopped the installation, so kind weird.

Any clue what's the problem and how to fix this? I downloaded the SP2 from Microsoft.com. Just want to get SP2 but seems too hard.

There is no way around but modify the SP2.

Just download an XP-disc with SP2 prefetched ;)
Aww don't wanna install windows and everything again :(.
Well can anyone download SP2 with this? I doubt it but i got SP1 and all the other security patches with this...

my little brother's computer resently got infected by virus and completly shut his computer down. As the way would have it we dont have a windows CD so i downloaded this client. I then "format C:" his comp and installed this windows version.. the only (big) problem is that his keyboard is in brittish style (or american mabye?).. and his keys are a bit f'ed up. Does anyone know how to fix this problem? (we are swedish) would be a big help thx!
